title: Apply for, renew or update a UK passport online

details.description: You can apply for, update or renew a passport online
details.more_information: You can’t use this service if you’re travelling within the next 4 weeks - you’ll need to use the 1-week or 1-day service.
details.introduction:
You can complete an online application form to apply for, renew or update a passport.

The pre-printed application form will then be returned to you to sign, date, add any documents or photographs that are needed, and return for processing.
details.will_continue_on: the Identity and Passport Service (IPS) website
details.alternate_methods: You can pick up passport application forms from your local Post Office.

details.description: Eligibility, fees, applying, renewing and updating

parent.title: Citizenship and life in the UK

details.description: Includes voting and how government works
Includes driving abroad, getting a passport, pet passports and bringing goods into the UK

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.

related.title: Apply for or renew your passport if you're abroad or live outside the UK
